name: Vegas Games Midnight Madness Slots & Video Edition
name_original: Vegas Games Midnight Madness Slots & Video Edition
description:
Vegas Games Midnight Madness Slots & Video Edition is a game developed by New World Computing. It was originally released in 2000. 3DO Company, The published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Vegas Games Midnight Madness Slots & Video Edition on PC.
